markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Black Hole Armor](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1842)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 14 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 8,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 5
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Fortress Plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=21)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The joints of this black _+2 [greater resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [fortification](/Equipment.aspx?ID=285) [fortress plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=21)_ look like swirling vortices of silver. Non-magical ammunition and thrown weapons aimed at you are destroyed after they hit you and deal damage or miss you. You also have resistance 10 to physical damage from ranged attacks.

 When an enemy's ranged attack misses you or hits you and deals no damage, the armor absorbs the projectile. When it has absorbed six projectiles, the armor glows at the joints.

<document level="2" id="action-1535" />

<document level="2" id="action-1536" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Black Hole Armor

Non-magical ammunition and thrown weapons aimed at you are destroyed after they hit you and deal damage or miss you. You also have resistance 10 to physical damage from ranged attacks. When an enemy's ranged attack misses you or hits you and deals no damage, the armor absorbs the projectile. When it has absorbed six projectiles, the armor glows at the joints.
